Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/26th
ShortDescription: SB 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 26th, Kostner, 31st, Komensky, and into the terminal, due to police activity near Pulaski/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 26th, Kostner, 31st, Komensky, and into the terminal, due to police activity near Pulaski/26th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
